titles.title: I'll just keep trusting my Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'll just keep trusting my Lord as I walk along
I'll just keep trusting my Lord and He gives a song
Tho' storm–clouds darken the sky o'er the heavenly trail
I'll just keep trusting my Lord, He will never fail
He's a faithful friend, such a faithful friend
You can count on Him to the very end
Tho' storm–clouds darken the sky o'er the heavenly trail
I'll just keep trusting my Lord, He will never fail
